meanings.definition: A soldier in a cavalry unit.
meanings.sent1: The brave cavalryman rode swiftly on his horse.
meanings.sent2: The cavalryman charged into battle on his trusty steed.
meanings.sent3: The cavalryman joked that his horse was the real leader of the unit.
meanings.sent4: In the field of battle, the cavalryman was a swift and unstoppable force.
meanings.sent5: The image of the cavalryman on horseback was etched in his mind forever.

meanings.definition: A member of a military unit that fights on horseback.
meanings.sent1: With a loud trumpet call, the cavalryman galloped into the fray.
meanings.sent2: The cavalryman's uniform gleamed in the sunlight as he rode into battle.
meanings.sent3: The cavalryman's horse seemed to have a mind of its own, charging ahead fearlessly.
meanings.sent4: The cavalryman's presence on the battlefield was like a swift gust of wind.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the cavalryman on horseback was both majestic and awe-inspiring.

meanings.definition: A person who serves in a cavalry unit.
meanings.sent1: The young recruit dreamed of becoming a skilled cavalryman one day.
meanings.sent2: The cavalryman's helmet shone brightly under the sun's rays.
meanings.sent3: The cavalryman's horseplay during training always brought laughter to the unit.
meanings.sent4: The cavalryman's loyalty to his comrades was unwavering in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The cavalryman's dedication to duty was unmatched among his peers.
